Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Netanya Noosa in Noosa Heads (Noosa), you'll be minutes from Noosa Beach and close to Noosa National Park. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Sunshine Beach Village Shops and Ed Webb Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 47 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this apartment consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Noosa Beach - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Noosa National Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sunshine Beach Village Shops - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Ed Webb Park - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Noosa Marina - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Coolum Beach - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Eumundi Market - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi
Cooroy Golf Club - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi
Ginger Factory - 22.8 km / 14.2 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 27 km / 16.8 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 29.8 km / 18.5 mi
Mooloolaba Beach - 32.8 km / 20.4 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 33.1 km / 20.6 mi
Big Pineapple - 33.4 km / 20.7 mi
Kawana Beach - 35.7 km / 22.2 mi

The preferred airport for Netanya Noosa is Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
